title: Interactive Web-Based Social Analysis Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Middle School-Level Social Studies Knowledge and Internet Research Proficiency
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers. Requires designing interactive learning activities feasible in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with continuous improvement through formative assessment feedback

learning_goals: Learners engage in at least three discussion activities with peer learners on topics related to social phenomenon analysis in online discussion forums
Learners apply analytical criteria to five social issue cases presented through a web-based quiz tool with 80% accuracy
Learners take on leadership roles at least once in learning community projects using mobile-friendly collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
